price: Na mlipo muuwa mtu, kisha mkakhitalifiana kwayo, na Mwenyezi Mungu ni mwenye kuyatoa hayo mliyo kuwa mkiyaficha.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَتَلۡتُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَٱدَّٰرَٰءۡتُمۡ فِيهَاۖ وَٱللَّهُ مُخۡرِجٞ مَّا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡتُمُونَ
footnotes: Na kumbukeni siku mlipo muuwa mtu, mkakhasimiana wenyewe kwa wenyewe, mkautetea ukhalifu, mkawa mkituhumiana kwa mauwaji, na hali Mwenyezi Mungu anaijua hakika, na ataikashifu na kuidhihirisha juu ya kuificha kwenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qataltum nafsan fa-iddāratum fīhā wal-lahu mukh'rijun mā kuntum taktumūna
